title.rendered: Kudotrade Unveils Kudo Copy Trader for Seamless Strategy Replication

content.rendered:
March 21, 2025

Kudotrade has introduced Kudo Copy Trader, a new feature that enables users to automatically follow and replicate the trading strategies of top-performing traders. This innovative tool is designed to benefit both novice investors and seasoned professionals looking to enhance their portfolios through strategic diversification.

With just a few clicks, users can select experienced traders on the platform and have their trades mirrored in real time. This functionality simplifies the trading process and provides easy access to expert-level strategies without requiring extensive market knowledge.

By adopting Kudo Copy Trader, users gain an effective way to diversify their investment approach while leveraging insights from high-performing market participants.

Kudotrade operates as a Contracts for Difference (CFD) broker, offering a wide range of instruments, including Forex, commodities, stocks, indices, and cryptocurrencies. Headquartered in Saint Lucia with operational offices in Dubai, Kudotrade continues to expand globally by offering secure, innovative trading solutions.

Finley Wilkinson, Director at Kudotrade at Kudotrade, said: “At Kudotrade, we are committed to continual innovation and making trading easier and more convenient. With Kudo Copy Trader, we’re giving our clients direct access to the expertise of top traders, helping them trade smarter within just a couple of seconds, while maintaining full transparency and control.”

Available on the App Store and Google Play, Kudo Copy Trader offers flexibility, allowing users to adjust risk preferences, stop copying trades at any time, and follow multiple strategies simultaneously for broader diversification.

Kudotrade holds a physical presence in three countries and operates under multiple regulated entities:

  • Kudo Trade (Mauritius) Ltd, authorized by the Financial Services Commission of Mauritius (License No. GB24203599);
  • Kudo Trade Ltd, registered in Saint Lucia under the International Business Companies Register (Registration No. 2024-00239);
  • Kudo Systems Ltd, based in Cyprus, acts as an appointed representative of Kudo Trade (Mauritius) Ltd with distribution rights.

Under the Kudotrade brand, the company delivers comprehensive financial trading services tailored to traders of all experience levels. The platform supports a wide selection of assets—Forex, stocks, indices, commodities, metals, and digital currencies—through the MetaTrader 5 terminal, renowned for its powerful tools and user-friendly interface.

Traders can choose between two account types based on their experience:

  • Standard Account – Ideal for beginners, offering zero commission, spreads from 0.7 pips, and a minimum deposit of $50.
  • Pro Account – Suited for experienced traders, with spreads starting from 0 pips, $8 per lot commission, and a $5,000 minimum deposit.
